import { useContext, React } from 'react' import DataContext from '../Context/Context' export const PersonalInfo = () => { const {name, setName, age, setAge, email, setEmail, discordTag, setDiscordTag, rpExp, setRpExp, ytLink, setYtLink, charBackStory, setCharBackStory, isRulesAgreed, setIsRulesAgreed, submitForm, setAgreed, loadingEffect, isLoading, hideCharInfo, showCharInfo } = useContext(DataContext) return (

Personal Information

e.preventDefault()}>
Name setName(e.target.value)} />
Age setAge(e.target.value)} />
Email setEmail(e.target.value)} />
Discord Tag setDiscordTag(e.target.value)} />
Has Read Rules
Youtube Link setYtLink(e.target.value)} />
) }
